entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight then changing to periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6 except minus 1 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6 except minus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
